New Records: The Detroit Tigers clinched a playoff berth with their victory.
The Chicago White Sox set a modern-era record with their 121st loss of the season.
Key Match Events: The Tigers defeated the White Sox 4-1 in the crucial game.
The White Sox fell to 121 losses, setting a record for losses in a season.
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers entered the game looking to secure a playoff spot and did so with their win.
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers celebrated their playoff clinching with a sold-out crowd at Comerica Park.
The White Sox's season ended with a disappointing record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was marked by the Tigers' dominance and the White Sox's struggles throughout the season.
